reviews.review:
Very disappointed with Avengers Infinity Wars. 

Sorry I do not like paying for half a movie. 

If you are a big fan of the comics and know how long the story is you might like it. 

If you are a fan of the movies you might be disappointed that they waste most of the first half of the movie with slow jokes and standing around talking then don't finish the movie. 

Theater was less than half full for the 1pm matinee on opening day. 

I'd prefer to wait and see it in a few years when part 2 comes out so you can see a complete story. 

You have been warned.
Although characters have limited screen time, the cast made sure that every second was their best performance.

this movie has to be seen to be believed. i have been waiting years and i still wasnt ready. idk why ll the critics are giving it low scores, outside of the fact that critics will give low scores to keep their jobs, but the movie is huge, almost as big as peter dinklage

The most sci-fi of all of these Marvel movies. Much more dark and unpredictable than most. A good movie with an interesting ending. Maybe the best Avenger movie to date simply because of the amount of characters on this movie. Other than that, not so much.
Amazing! Not what you expect. Think of it as a Thanos first movie not an Avengers movie and it’s top five all time easily.
Was awesome tons of action and drama loved it!! Can’t wait for the 2nd installment of the film
Exceed the expectations bringing shocking surprises and a lot of emotion! Thanos is the standout and the protagonist of this ambitious and thrilling ride!
Amazing. It lives up the hype. Marvel accomplished something never done before. They hit it out of the park.
It is worth every minute you waited to watch it.It has an unexpected ending, and it's full of thrilling moments. I never saw an audience screaming that much in the movie theater.
Hard to develop each character since there are so many but besides that it’s a must see movie
